description: Want a delicious dinner in a flash? Try this easy beef korma recipe with warm garlic naan and a creamy and crunchy salad.
keywords: Quick Beef Korma With Naan & Salad
name: Quick Beef Korma With Naan & Salad Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 270 g Woolworths creamy & crunchy salad kit

recipeInstructions.text: Warm naan according to packet instructions. Transfer beef to a serving bowl and top with mint. Serve with salad and naan.
